short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple-Tuber is a simple platform for watching videos from youtube

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple-Tuber is a simplest platform for watching videos from youtube.

If you are a fan of finding and watching videos, then you have found what you need and it's Simple-Tuber! 

With the installation of our extension, you may agree to change New tab in your browser on our Simple-Tuber start page. If you choose "Yes" in the future you can easily reach your last video search. This is a very convenient functionality for lovers of watching their favorite videos.

The simple interface is our key detail! You type the text on our search bar and:
- Press Enter - to get some cool videos and cartoons very fast for your children or yourself. And every last request is remembered to use it in new tab.

Using YouTube is easier than before? How is that? 

Install our extension and you get you haven't seen before!

Please note we may show you some banners by watching videos, you can close them by clicking on x - on the top right.


By clicking ‘Add to Chrome’ and installing this extension on your desktop, you are accepting and agreeing to install the Simple-Tuber Chrome extension, and understand that your browser new tab will be replaced to our start page, and accept the Privacy and Terms of Use of the extension.
